entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:17PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RELEASE OF GLACIER DAMMED LAKE ON THE SALMON RIVER NEAR HYDER... WATER LEVELS ON THE SALMON RIVER NEAR HYDER, ALASKA BEGAN RISING BEYOND THE NORMAL DAILY RISE ON SUNDAY NIGHT. THE RIVER HAS BEEN RISING AT APPROXIMATELY 1 FOOT IN 18 HOURS. IN THE PAST THIS EVENT IS ABOUT 4 DAYS LONG FROM START TO FINISH, WHICH WOULD PUT THE CREST ON THURSDAY THE 29TH. HOWEVER, THIS IS AN EARLIER THAN NORMAL
entry.cap:areaDesc: City of Hyder
